thread.section_title: Cler Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful boutique hotel - Review of Cler Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mayabh
title: Beautiful boutique hotel
text:
I definitely recommend this hotel .
Although it's small (very small rooms)
It's absolutely lovely.
We got to the hotel at 9am and they gave us our room right away.
The room was very clean with modern chic design.
The Costomer service were wonderful, lots of patience and made sure we got all our QS answered.
They offered to keep our luggage after we checked out so we can be free to travel some more until our flight.
The location is very convenient,10 min walk from the Eiffel Tower and 5 min walk to metro.
In the morning there is a wonderful market just down the hotel entrance door.
They sale wine, cheese, honey, fruits and veggies.
2 wonderful bakeries at the same street wonderful macaroons and pastries.
Lots of small dining Resturant and cafes.
